messages.message: Hi Team! I wanted to share some feedback regarding the process of adding fields in "Build." Currently, it requires clicking back to add each new field, which can be somewhat cumbersome. It would be more efficient if there were an option to add multiple fields consecutively to then be able to review them all at once.  Then if one is not yielding the desired results (eg. cleaning, description, etc) you would click into that field to edit and configure.

we had this exact UI before :sweat_smile:, but many users didn’t realize they could edit fields after creating them (ex: they never tweaked the field description, field type, etc and got stuck when the result wasn’t as desired)

@Kaustubh (KD) let’s keep an eye out to see if we see more feedback like Madison’s in the future
Yeah like Serena mentioned here, we've gotten feedback both ways (you can't make everyone happy :slightly_smiling_face:). However I'm going to track this as well.
Ah got it! Thanks for the reply here. :slightly_smiling_face:
